rescuecore2.registry
Class Registry

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.registry.Registry

public final class Registry
extends java.lang.Object

A class for managing the different types of entities, properties, messages and their associated factories.

Field Summary

          The system-(or at least Classloader)-wide Registry.

registerEntityFactory

public void registerEntityFactory(EntityFactory factory)
Register an entity factory. This will register all entity URNs that the factory knows about.

Parameters:
factory - The entity factory to register.

registerEntityFactory

public void registerEntityFactory(java.lang.String urn,
                                  EntityFactory factory)
Register an entity URN and assign an EntityFactory for constructing instances of this type.

Parameters:
urn - The urn to register.
factory - The factory that is responsible for constructing entity instances of this type.

createEntity

public Entity createEntity(java.lang.String urn,
                           EntityID id)
Create an entity from a urn. If the urn is not recognised then return null. This method will delegate to the previously registered EntityFactory.

Parameters:
urn - The urn of the entity type to create.
id - The EntityID of the Entity that will be created.
Returns:
A new Entity object, or null if the urn is not recognised.

createProperty

public Property createProperty(java.lang.String urn)
Create a property from a urn. If the urn is not recognised then return null. This method will delegate to the previously registered PropertyFactory.

Parameters:
urn - The urn of the property type to create.
Returns:
A new Property object, or null if the urn is not recognised.

createMessage

public Message createMessage(java.lang.String urn,
                             java.io.InputStream data)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Create a message from a urn. If the urn is not recognised then return null. This method will delegate to the previously registered MessageFactory.

Parameters:
urn - The urn of the message type to create.
data - An InputStream to read message data from.
Returns:
A new Message object, or null if the urn is not recognised.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is a problem decoding the message.

getEntityFactory

protected EntityFactory getEntityFactory(java.lang.String urn)
Get the entity factory for a URN, delegating to the parent if required.

Parameters:
urn - The URN to look up.
Returns:
An EntityFactory, or null if the URN is not recognised.

getPropertyFactory

protected PropertyFactory getPropertyFactory(java.lang.String urn)
Get the property factory for a URN, delegating to the parent if required.

Parameters:
urn - The URN to look up.
Returns:
A PropertyFactory, or null if the URN is not recognised.

getMessageFactory

protected MessageFactory getMessageFactory(java.lang.String urn)
Get the message factory for a URN, delegating to the parent if required.

Parameters:
urn - The URN to look up.
Returns:
A MessageFactory, or null if the URN is not recognised.
